Articles.Content:
I have recently been experiencing CTDs when attempting to enter a building from the main space center view.  This issue usually occurs after I have been playing for a while, but once it occurs, it will happen every time I restart the game.  This will persist until I restart the entire computer. 


My computer specs are as follows:

Intel Core i7-4790K @ 4.00GHz

12 GB RAM

NVidia GeForce GTX 970

Windows 10 Pro

 

The five most recent error logs are in this ZIP file: Error Logs.

 

If anyone has any information on what is causing these issues, I would very much appreciate your assistance.  If any additional data would help in solving the problem, please ask, and I will do my best to provide it.
I've been experiencing it off an on as well.  But the last few days it hasn't happened, and I haven't been able to reproduce it for a bug report.  Very odd....

33 minutes ago, Just Jim said:

I've been experiencing it off an on as well.  But the last few days it hasn't happened, and I haven't been able to reproduce it for a bug report.  Very odd....

It happens to me, mostly when I switch vehicle often or revert back to the VAB/SPH. I've noticed the garbage generation gets high during reverts.
